title: Provide a Shipping Quote
description: A sales agent is on the phone with a potential customer and needs to provide a real-time shipping quote for an order.

tasks.description: Enter the destination address and the list of items the customer wants to order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately inputs the required information.

tasks.description: Use a rating engine to get real-time shipping rates from multiple carriers (e.g., Parcel, LTL).
tasks.expected_outcome: The system returns quotes for Standard Ground, 2-Day Air, and Next-Day Air.

tasks.description: Communicate the different shipping options and their costs to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly presents the available shipping methods and prices.
